## Source: amazon-inspector (a74bf7ef4160cbd326cf0897bab905bbc059392581da57f6b10e99471e5c60c7)
The package fec-cms was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (110aae9d904f5e4469a068418b8fe0f1fdf2094e4945829b8793584539f2a975)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'fec-cms' @ 5.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
